title: Cathouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Thai, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is primarily veggie-based with some meat offered. Vegan should specify as dairy and yogurt-based sauce are used in some dishes. Food is Thai-based flavors in western forms (sandwich, wrap, quesadilla, salad, fries, onion rings), plus curries and soups as well. Casual, relaxed atmosphere with free Wi-Fi. Previously located at Sirimangalajarn Soi 3, change of location spring 2012.
